downloadTitle: Customization Manager in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Customization Manager module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.
detailsSection:
Audience This training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the customization manager module in Microsoft Dynamics SL At Training Material Completion After completing this course, students should be able to:
  • Rearrange the fields in data entry windows to more closely resemble source document formats, or to make room for new or additional fields.
  • Change the tab order the cursor moves through the fields in each screen.
  • Change the default values of certain fields.
  • Modify the way data fields display values like telephone numbers and Social Security numbers.
  • Hide fields for all users or specific users.
  • Make fields display-only.
  • Add new items to windows such as data object fields, labels, buttons, frames, panels, subforms, and tabs.
  • Write Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) code and associate the VBA code with a Microsoft Dynamics SL window or object.
Prerequisites Before reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • General knowledge of Microsoft Windows
  • Knowledge of basic navigation functions in Microsoft Dynamics SL.
